Physical Exam: Vital signs (temperature, pulse, respiration, blood pressure)
Justification: To assess the patient's overall health and identify any potential abnormalities.
To assess the patient's respiratory system and identify any potential abnormalities.
To assess the patient's cardiovascular system and identify any potential abnormalities.

Physical Exam: Examination of the head and neck
Justification: To assess the patient's head and neck, including the ears, nose, and throat.
To assess the patient's vocal cords and identify any potential abnormalities.
